channel.title: Need help with starter
channel.description: Ok, so when a player joins (me) I get the starter, then when I log out and back in, I get the starter again, and again, each time I log out and back in the starter is given to me does anyone know how to fix this? Now I get an error when trying to fix just wondering if anyone knows how to fix this: [code=text]src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:2071: error: cannot find symbol if (!Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { ^ symbol: method hasRecieved1stStarter(String) location: class Connection Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
